item.title: ScanFloat
item.description: {{ ScanUint Field }} Example type Book struct { ID uint64 Rating float64 } var queryBook = sqlt.All[any, Book](sqlt.Parse(` SELECT id {{ Scan "ID" }} , rating {{ ScanFloat "Rating" }} FROM books; `))
